author: ETA PRIME
description:
We turned the brand-new X+ RIVAL Mini Gaming PC into the ultimate living room console killer! By installing Bazzite OS, a powerful alternative to SteamOS, we've created the Micro Steam Machine we've always dreamed of. This tiny PC is an absolute beast for AAA gaming on Linux.

Powered by the next-generation AMD Ryzen AI Max+ 395 APU and a massive 96GB of LPDDR5X RAM, this Mini PC has desktop-class power. We push the new Radeon 8060S integrated graphics to its limits to see if it can truly handle modern AAA titles at high settings. #etaprime #BazziteOS #LinuxGaming #SteamMachine #MiniPC #SFFPC #AMD #TechReview
